statements: SELECT * FROM artists
SELECT artist_name, nomination_year FROM artists ORDER BY nomination_year DESC
SELECT artist_name, award_name FROM artists WHERE nomination_year > 2010
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE award_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT artist_id, artist_name FROM artists WHERE nomination_year < 2005
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE nomination_year > 2010
SELECT artist_name, award_name FROM artists WHERE nomination_year < 2005 ORDER BY artist_name ASC
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(artist_id) AS total_awards FROM artists WHERE award_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY artist_name HAVING COUNT(artist_id) > 2
SELECT artist_name, nomination_year FROM artists WHERE award_name IS NULL ORDER BY nomination_year DESC
SELECT artist_name, award_name, nomination_year FROM artists WHERE nomination_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 ORDER BY nomination_year ASC
SELECT * FROM awards;
SELECT id, musician_id, award_category, award_year FROM awards WHERE award_year = 2021;
SELECT award_category, award_year FROM awards WHERE musician_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT award_category, musician_id FROM awards WHERE award_year > 2018 ORDER BY award_year DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT award_year FROM awards;
SELECT id, musician_id, award_category, award_year FROM awards;
SELECT * FROM awards WHERE award_year > 2010 ORDER BY award_year DESC;
SELECT musician_id, award_category FROM awards WHERE award_year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 ORDER BY musician_id;
SELECT id, musician_id, award_category, award_year FROM awards WHERE musician_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND award_year < 2015;
SELECT id, nomination_category, nomination_year, is_winner FROM nominations WHERE nomination_year > 2015 AND is_winner = TRUE ORDER BY nomination_year DESC;
SELECT musician_name, genre FROM musicians;
SELECT * FROM musicians WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT award_name, award_year FROM awards ORDER BY award_year DESC;
SELECT musician_name, genre, award_name FROM musicians JOIN awards ON musicians.musician_id = awards.musician_id;
SELECT musician_name, nomination_name, nomination_year FROM musicians JOIN nominations ON musicians.musician_id = nominations.musician_id ORDER BY nomination_year ASC;
SELECT * FROM musicians;
SELECT musician_name, genre FROM musicians WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY musician_name ASC;
SELECT musician_name, award_name, award_year FROM musicians JOIN awards ON musicians.musician_id = awards.musician_id WHERE award_year > 2000;

SELECT musician_name, nomination_name, nomination_year FROM musicians JOIN nominations ON musicians.musician_id = nominations.musician_id WHERE nomination_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY nomination_year DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_awards, musician_name FROM musicians JOIN awards ON musicians.musician_id = awards.musician_id GROUP BY musician_name HAVING total_awards > 2 ORDER BY total_awards DESC;
SELECT * FROM musician_awards;
SELECT musician_id, award_name, nomination_year FROM musician_awards WHERE nomination_year > 2010;
SELECT musician_id, award_name FROM musician_awards WHERE award_name = 'Grammy';
SELECT * FROM award_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT musician_id, genre_name FROM musician_genres ORDER BY musician_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM musician_awards WHERE nomination_year > 2010;
SELECT award_name, musician_id FROM musician_awards WHERE award_name = 'Grammy';
SELECT * FROM musician_albums ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT musician_id, COUNT(album_name) AS album_count FROM musician_albums GROUP BY musician_id;
SELECT * FROM musician_genres WHERE musician_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM artist;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artist;
SELECT artist_name, birth_date FROM artist ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM award WHERE category = 'Music';
SELECT artist_name, birth_date, genre FROM artist WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT * FROM artist WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY artist_name ASC, birth_date DESC
SELECT artist_name, birth_date, genre FROM artist WHERE birth_date BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31'
SELECT artist_name, award_name FROM artist JOIN nomination ON artist.artist_id = nomination.artist_id JOIN award ON nomination.award_id = award.award_id WHERE nomination_year = 2020
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(DISTINCT award_id) AS num_awards FROM artist JOIN nomination ON artist.artist_id = nomination.artist_id GROUP BY artist_name HAVING num_awards >= 2
SELECT category, AVG(year) AS avg_year FROM award WHERE category LIKE '%Music%' GROUP BY category ORDER BY avg_year DESC
